title: International Liaison department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China donated medical supplies to Gabonese Democratic Party for COVID-19 relief in June 2020
description: On June 22nd 2020, the International Liaison department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CCCPC) donated medical supplies to the Gabonese Democratic Party. This donation includes medical masks and forehead thermometers. The purpose of this donation is to help the Gabonese Democratic Party fight against the pandemic and promote new progress in relations between the two parties.

# Description
On June 22nd 2020, the International Liaison department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CCCPC) donated medical supplies to the Gabonese Democratic Party. This donation includes medical masks and forehead thermometers. The purpose of this donation is to help the Gabonese Democratic Party fight against the pandemic and promote new progress in relations between the two parties.
justification: Project is focused on healthcare support and pandemic relief, with no direct environmental or energy transition impact

title: Chinese Government donated medical supplies to École Pilote Sino Gabonaise Primary School in November 2020

title: China-Gambia Agriculture Project holds technical training for Agricultural Science Teacher Association of Gambia (ASTAGAM) in February 2020 (linked to #57048)
description: From February 24-28, 2020, the Agricultural Science Teacher Association of Gambia (ASTAGAM) received technical training at the Department of Agriculture in Sapu, Gambia. This technical training was sponsored by the China Aided Agriculture Technical Assistance to The Gambia Project (中国援冈比亚农业技术合作项目). See project #57048 for more information on this initiative.    For this training, the Chinese technical assistance team taught different agricultural techniques to Gambian trainees over the course of five days. Skills that were taught included use of vegetable seeding technology, making and using compost fertilizer, farm and garden demarcation and layout, and modern agricultural production practices. The exact monetary value of this project is unclear.   The opening ceremony of this training project was held on February 24, 2020. On February 24 and 25, Chinese horticulture expert Yang Jinping taught the vegetable seedling technique and organic fertilizer making and using. On February 26, Mr. Huang Zhi lectured on land planning, sustainable development, and land and sustainability evaluation. He also led the ASTAGAM trainees to visit the core demonstration area of the China-Gambia agriculture project. On February 27, Chinese rice expert Zhang Xiaohui discussed analysis of the development trends of modern agriculture. On February 28, the training’s closing ceremony was held. The China-Gambia agriculture project team, the trainees in ASTAGAM, and Gambian officials such as the Governor of CRR, Sherriff Abba Sanyang.
staff_comments: 1. As this project appears to be part of the larger China-Gambia Agriculture Technology Cooperation Project, which was funded by the Chinese Ministry of Commerce, MOFCOM has been put as the funding agency for this project as well.
combined_text:
# Sector
AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, FISHING

# Title

This technical training was sponsored by the China Aided Agriculture Technical Assistance to The Gambia Project (中国援冈比亚农业技术合作项目). See project #57048 for more information on this initiative.    For this training, the Chinese technical assistance team taught different agricultural techniques to Gambian trainees over the course of five days. Skills that were taught included use of vegetable seeding technology, making and using compost fertilizer, farm and garden demarcation and layout, and modern agricultural production practices. The exact monetary value of this project is unclear.   The opening ceremony of this training project was held on February 24, 2020. On February 24 and 25, Chinese horticulture expert Yang Jinping taught the vegetable seedling technique and organic fertilizer making and using. On February 26, Mr. Huang Zhi lectured on land planning, sustainable development, and land and sustainability evaluation. He also led the ASTAGAM trainees to visit the core demonstration area of the China-Gambia agriculture project. On February 27, Chinese rice expert Zhang Xiaohui discussed analysis of the development trends of modern agriculture. On February 28, the training’s closing ceremony was held. The China-Gambia agriculture project team, the trainees in ASTAGAM, and Gambian officials such as the Governor of CRR, Sherriff Abba Sanyang.

title: Chinese government provides sanitation supplies to Kanifing municipal council, Gambia in November 2020
description: On November 12, 2020, the Chinese Embassy provided sanitation supplies to the municipal council of Kanifing in Gambia. The supplies included personal protective equipment, hand washing buckets, disinfectant, and disinfectant sprayers. These materials were to be used to support primary and secondary schools that resumed in-person classes during the COVID-19 pandemic. The exact monetary value of this donation is unknown.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation. Ma Jianchun, China’s Ambassador to Gambia, and Lord Mayor Talib Ahmed Bensouda of Kanifing attended the donation ceremony. During the ceremony, Mayor Bensouda spoke highly of the cooperation between Gambia and China and thanked China for the donation.
combined_text:

A handover ceremony was held for this donation. Ma Jianchun, China’s Ambassador to Gambia, and Lord Mayor Talib Ahmed Bensouda of Kanifing attended the donation ceremony. evidence: Sanitation supplies for schools, COVID-19 response, public health focus

title: Chinese government provides medical supplies to the Gambia June 2020
description: On June 19, 2020, the Chinese government donated medical supplies to the office of the First Lady of the Gambia. These supplies will be used for epidemic prevention in the Gambia. The donation included face masks and forehead thermometers.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation at the Gambia Presidential Palace. Present at the ceremony were Chinese Ambassador Ma Jianchun, First Lady Fatoumatta Bah-Barrow, Foreign Minister Dr. Mamadou Tangara, and Minister of Basic and Secondary Education Claudia Cole. Following the handover of the supplies from the ambassador to the First Lady, the First Lady passed on the supplies to the Ministry of Basic and Secondary Education for classroom use as local primary and secondary schools planned to return to in-person classes.
combined_text:
# Sector
HEALTH

# Title
Chinese government provides medical supplies to the Gambia June 2020

# Description
On June 19, 2020, the Chinese government donated medical supplies to the office of the First Lady of the Gambia. These supplies will be used for epidemic prevention in the Gambia. The donation included face masks and forehead thermometers.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation at the Gambia Presidential Palace. Present at the ceremony were Chinese Ambassador Ma Jianchun, First Lady Fatoumatta Bah-Barrow, Foreign Minister Dr. Mamadou Tangara, and Minister of Basic and Secondary Education Claudia Cole. Following the handover of the supplies from the ambassador to the First Lady, the First Lady passed on the supplies to the Ministry of Basic and Secondary Education for classroom use as local primary and secondary schools planned to return to in-person classes.
justification: Project is focused on healthcare support and epidemic prevention, with no direct energy or environmental implications
evidence: Medical supplies donation for epidemic prevention, focus on education sector support

title: Chinese Government provides agricultural supplies in June 2020 (Linked to Project ID#57048).
description: On June 5, 2020, the Chinese Government donated a set of agricultural supplies to the Gambian Government. These materials will be used to improve the work of the Ministry of Agriculture in Gambia, especially their work on improving rice yields. The donation included 30 power tillers, 30 mini threshers, 25 irrigation pumps, 31 rice mills, a transplanter, a combine harvester, 10 tons of urea fertilizer, lubricants and spare parts.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation in Banjul, the capital of Gambia. Ma Jianchun, China’s Ambassador to the Gambia, Amie Fabureh, the Minister of Agriculture, and the WFP's representative in Gambia attended the ceremony. During the ceremony, Ambassador Ma Jianchun and the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Gambia, Momadou Tangara, signed the handover certificate and delivered speeches. This donation is part of a larger initiative by China to assist Gambia in agricultural technological development ( see Project ID#57048 for more details).
staff_comments: 1. This project is part of the larger 中冈农业合作项目 (China-Gambia agricultural cooperation project).
combined_text:
# Sector
AGRICULTURE, FORESTRY, FISHING

# Title

# Description
On June 5, 2020, the Chinese Government donated a set of agricultural supplies to the Gambian Government. These materials will be used to improve the work of the Ministry of Agriculture in Gambia, especially their work on improving rice yields. The donation included 30 power tillers, 30 mini threshers, 25 irrigation pumps, 31 rice mills, a transplanter, a combine harvester, 10 tons of urea fertilizer, lubricants and spare parts.  A handover ceremony was held for this donation in Banjul, the capital of Gambia. Ma Jianchun, China’s Ambassador to the Gambia, Amie Fabureh, the Minister of Agriculture, and the WFP's representative in Gambia attended the ceremony. During the ceremony, Ambassador Ma Jianchun and the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Gambia, Momadou Tangara, signed the handover certificate and delivered speeches. This donation is part of a larger initiative by China to assist Gambia in agricultural technological development ( see Project ID#57048 for more details).
justification: Project focuses on agricultural development assistance without clear environmental or energy transition impacts
evidence: Donation of agricultural equipment and supplies for rice production improvement, part of agricultural technological development initiative

title: Chinese Embassy provides Chinese teaching materials to Nusrat Senior Secondary School in the Gambia in December 2020
description: On December 22, 2020, the Chinese Embassy provided school supplies to Nusrat Senior Secondary School in Gambia. The materials donated included books, videos, stationary, and sanitation supplies. The donated educational items were to be used specifically in the Chinese Culture Corner at the high school and the sanitation supplies were to aid epidemic prevention efforts. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.   A handover ceremony took place for this donation at the Chinese Embassy in Gambia. China’s Ambassador to the Gambia, Ma Jianchun, the principal of Nusrat Secondary School in Gambia, the Chairman of the School Management Committee, and Bo Jiang, the former president of Nusrat Secondary School attended the ceremony.
combined_text:
# Sector
EDUCATION

# Title
Chinese Embassy provides Chinese teaching materials to Nusrat Senior Secondary School in the Gambia in December 2020

# Description
On December 22, 2020, the Chinese Embassy provided school supplies to Nusrat Senior Secondary School in Gambia. The materials donated included books, videos, stationary, and sanitation supplies. The donated educational items were to be used specifically in the Chinese Culture Corner at the high school and the sanitation supplies were to aid epidemic prevention efforts. The monetary value of this donation is unknown.   A handover ceremony took place for this donation at the Chinese Embassy in Gambia. China’s Ambassador to the Gambia, Ma Jianchun, the principal of Nusrat Secondary School in Gambia, the Chairman of the School Management Committee, and Bo Jiang, the former president of Nusrat Secondary School attended the ceremony.
justification: Project focuses on educational support and cultural exchange without direct environmental or energy transition impacts
evidence: Donation of educational materials and sanitation supplies for school use, cultural exchange focus

title: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region provides medical supplies to the Gambia (Linked to project #94645)
description: On July 24, 2020, the government of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region of China donated medical supplies to the Gambian government. According to The Voice News, the donation comprised 10,000 medical masks, 1,000 N95 respiratory masks, 100 protective suits, 100 safety goggles, and 79 infrared thermometers. The Guangxi Autonomous region has a sister city relationship with Banjul, capital of the Gambia.   A handover ceremony was held for this donation and a concurrent donation of sewing machines (see Project ID #94645) at the Presidential Palace of Gambia. China’s Ambassador to China, Ma Jianchun, the First Lady of Gambia, Lady Fatoumatta Bah-Barrow, and other officials attended the ceremony. The materials were distributed to the Gambia Nurses and Midwives association for COVID-19 prevention efforts.
staff_comments: AidData has estimated the transaction amount for this donation based on price catalogues from the World Health Organization (WHO). Please see the TUFF Methodology for additional details.
combined_text:
